Package equipments.Lamp

Class Lamp

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
equipments.Lamp.Lamp
All Implemented Interfaces:
LampImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI
public class Lamp extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent implements LampImplementationI
The class Lamp implements the cooking plate component.

Description TODO

The lamp is an uncontrollable appliance, hence it does not connect with the household energy manager. However, it will connect later to the electric panel to take its (simulated) electricity consumption into account.

White-box Invariant 

 invariant      
 currentState != null
 
 invariant      
 currentMode != null

Black-box Invariant 

 invariant      
 true
         // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Jacques Malenfant
